TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataGridPagerStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle
Public NotInheritable Class DataGridPagerStyle Inherits TableItemStyle

summary.span: 为 控件的页导航提供样式。

span.span: Specifies the style for the pager of the control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 寻呼程序是一个元素上启用控制，可用于分页时，链接到其他页。The pager is an element on the control that allows you to link to other pages when paging is enabled. 属性控件使用此类的实例来表示寻呼程序的样式属性。The property of the control uses an instance of this class to represent the style properties for the pager. 分页的详细信息，请参阅和。For more information on paging, see and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象以代表中的页导航元素的样式属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to represent the style of the pager element in the property. 对象设置的显示模式和分页元素的对齐方式。The object sets the display mode and alignment of the paging element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFrom(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFrom (s As Style)

span.span: The to copy from.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式复制到 类的此实例中。

span.span: Copies the style of the specified object into this instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以复制指定的样式属性到此实例的对象类。Use the method to copy the style properties of the specified object into this instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以复制的属性对象传递给对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the properties of a object to a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.CopyFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.CopyFrom Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.CopyFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.CopyFrom Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

span.span: The to merge with.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式与 类的此实例合并在一起。

span.span: Merges the style of the specified object with this instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，将合并的样式属性的指定对象与此实例的类。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with this instance of the class. 如果来自此实例的属性已设置为一个值，属性保持不变。If a property from this instance is already set to a value, the property is unchanged. 如果未设置属性，此方法会设置该属性的值的相应属性从对象。If a property is not set, this method sets that property with the value from the corresponding property of the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法的属性组合在一起对象对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the properties of a object with a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.MergeWith Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerMode Mode { System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定页导航元素是显示链接到下一页和前一页的按钮，还是显示直接与某一页链接的数值按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the pager element displays buttons that link to the next and previous page, or numeric buttons that link directly to a page.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的页导航按钮上使用控件。Use the property to specify which set of pager buttons to use on the control. 你可以指定将链接到下一步和上一个页的按钮或直接进入页面链接的数值按钮。You can specify buttons that link to the next and previous page, or numeric buttons that link directly to a page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的页导航元素显示为链接到下一步和上一个页面的按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the pager element is displayed as buttons that link to the next and previous page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Mode Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NextPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为下一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next page button.

value.span: 为下一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display for the next page button.

value.span: 默认值是，它呈现为大于号 (>)。

span.span: The default value is , which is rendered as the greater than sign (>).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来提供自定义文本下一页按钮。Use the property to provide custom text for the next page button. 属性必须设置为`PagerMode.NextPrev`，此属性才会产生任何影响。The property must be set to `PagerMode.NextPrev` for this property to have any effect. 此属性用于沿属性上创建一组自定义控件，寻呼程序的下一步和上一个按钮用于控件。This property is used along with the property to create a custom set of controls for the next and previous buttons of the pager on the control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不会自动编码为 html 格式的特殊字符。This property does not automatically encode special characters to HTML. 你需要将这些字符转换为相应的 HTML 值。You need to convert these characters to the appropriate HTML value. 例如大于号 (>) 将不自动转换为`>`。For example the greater than sign (>) will not automatically convert to `>`. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定的页导航元素的下一步页导航按钮的自定义文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify custom text for the next page navigation button of the pager element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The specified value is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PageButtonCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件的页导航元素中同时显示的数值按钮的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of numeric buttons to display concurrently in the pager element of the control.

value.span: 在 控件的页导航元素中同时显示的数值按钮的数目。

span.span: The number of numeric buttons to display concurrently in the pager element of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性，以指定数字要同时显示的页导航元素中的按钮数控件。Use the property to specify the number of numeric buttons to display concurrently in the pager element of the control. 属性必须设置为`PagerMode.NumericPages`，此属性才会产生任何影响。The property must be set to `PagerMode.NumericPages` for this property to have any effect. 如果有多个页中的控制不是此属性，省略号按钮 （…） 中指定页导航元素中显示。If there are more pages in the control than specified in this property, ellipsis buttons (...) are displayed in the pager element. 单击时，这些按钮将显示下一个或上一组数值的按钮。When clicked, these buttons display the next or previous set of numeric buttons. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中的页导航元素同时显示五个数字寻呼按钮控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display five numeric page buttons concurrently in the pager element of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.PageButtonCount Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The selected value is less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerPosition Position { System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerPosition get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::PagerPosition value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中页导航元素的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the pager element in the control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的位置，其中的页导航元素将显示在控件。Use the property to specify the location where the pager element is displayed in the control. 页导航元素可以是显示在的上边缘、 下边缘，或这两个的右上边缘和下边缘的控件。The pager element can be displayed at the upper edge, the lower edge, or at both the upper and lower edges of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定寻呼程序将显示在的上边缘控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the pager is displayed at the upper edge of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.Position Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PrevPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为前一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous page button.

value.span: 为前一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display for the previous page button.

value.span: 默认值是，它呈现为小于号 (<)。

span.span: The default value is , which is rendered as the less than sign (<).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来提供自定义文本下一页按钮。Use the property to provide custom text for the next page button. 属性必须设置为`PagerMode.NextPrev`，此属性才会产生任何影响。The property must be set to `PagerMode.NextPrev` for this property to have any effect. 此属性用于沿属性上创建自定义外观寻呼程序的下一步和上一个按钮控件。This property is used along with the property to create a custom appearance for the next and previous buttons of the pager on the control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不会自动编码为 html 格式的特殊字符。This property does not automatically encode special characters to HTML. 你需要将特殊字符转换为相应的 HTML 值。You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value. 例如，大于号 (>) 将不自动转换为`>`。For example, the greater than sign (>) will not automatically convert to `>`. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定的页导航元素上一页导航按钮的自定义文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify custom text for the previous page navigation button of the pager element. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPagerStyle.NextPageText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the pager is displayed in the control.

value.span: 若要显示页导航，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to display the pager; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定是否在显示寻呼程序控件。Use the property to specify whether the pager is displayed in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示和隐藏中的页导航元素控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display and hide the pager element in the control.
